about_the_game:
KilaFlow is a fast paced precision 3D platformer where you play as a cute and mischievous Antivirus trying to fix the mistakes of it's creator and save all data from a mysterious virus!

A new blast from the past!

In KilaFlow, you play as a digital simulation of a Toy Robot named "Kila", the mascot of the "KilaFlow" Antivirus. It's creator, Connor D. Rive, has made Kila in hopes that it can cure and fend off any and all viruses that plague their life. Kila must find the nine keys of each program to gain access to the source of the virus and bring it back to the side of cute and friendly, by any means Kila (or YOU) feels like!



Walk, Run, Jump, Bounce, Spin, Charge, or FLOW your way to the end and save as much data it takes along the way! You may be an Antivirus, but when was the last time one of those ever REALLY fixed the problem, huh? Save all the corrupted data, or don't! Beat the best time, or take as much time as you need! As long as you reach the Golden Brackets, collect the key, and beat the virus, it doesn't matter how much you help as long as you're having fun!

Generating Keys, Saving Data, and Staying Squeaky Clean!

With 7+ stylish worlds, each having 9 short but challenging levels and a boss, KilaFlow will present you with new challenge after challenge, obstacle after obstacle, huggable data critters after huggable data critters! Whether you're a speedrunner, completionist, or just here for casual platforming fun, there are many ways to play and enjoy this series of digital obstacle courses! Beat the best times of levels to get better keys and unlock secrets, save or ignore every data to receive awards or face stronger foes, and you can do it all without taking a tick of damage! The real challenge starts when you chose to perfect your runs and do every challenge the game has to offer. Though, if that's not your thing, just getting to the end is fine too! Play as much or as little as you choose!

Hills of Green, Vaporwave Dreams, Dinosaur Trains, and Robot Pains!

From an virtual pet on an oldschool computer browser to a sketchy dating app with some questionable characters, Kila cleans it all! Chill out to the beats from a friendly dolphin in a Vaporwave Cove, or run across train cars in a Dinosaur ridden offline Desert. Be careful what you click when journeying through literal Ad Space, and don't trust every wise Gorilla offering to send emails for you in the big city. Who knows what Antivirus Adventures you might find yourself in!

Made for fun, and made for YOU!

KilaFlow is a small, simple, and fun little platformer I began developing to keep my spirits up, and I'd like to share that fun with you all as well! It has since succeeded it's Kickstarter with the support of it's community, and I intend to keep developing it with the players needs first! Thank you very much!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS 3
  • Processor: 7 nm AMD APU
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 1050 Ti
  • Sound Card: Stereo
  • Additional Notes: Should run on most modern gaming laptops, handhelds, and pcs. If it's comparable to a steam deck, it can run it.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Steam OS 3
  • Processor: 7 nm AMD APU
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 1050 Ti
  • Sound Card: Stereo
  • Additional Notes: Should run on most modern gaming laptops, handhelds, and pcs. If it's comparable to a steam deck, it can run it.

  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
  • Additional Notes: Should run on most modern gaming laptops, handhelds, and pcs. If it's comparable to a steam deck, it can run it.

short_description: KilaFlow is a fast paced Precision 3d Platformer featuring a Toy Robot Antivirus who switches gears to speed up and save Datyte from the infection of an evil and mysterious Virus threat! Bounce, Slide, and Spin between programs and worlds to generate Keygems and cure the cute critters in your path!
